verbs.description: [ARG0: pharrell williams] [V: sends] [ARG1: trump cease - and - desist for playing happy at rally] pharrell williams is n't too happy with president trump using his song at a rally on the same day 11 people were killed in a pittsburgh synagogue shooting robert bowers president murphysboro los angeles times pittsburgh howard e king attorney e pratt king donald trump tree of life synagogue indiana pharrell williams murder murphysboro illinois
